name: I Spy Castle
overview: Play I SPY riddles and brain-teasing puzzles to unlock new rooms of the castle and uncover its intriguing history. Search for over 400 objects in 36 I SPY riddles, play mini-games and reveal the castle's secrets. Features • Solve 36 I SPY riddles across 12 photo-realistic castle scenes. • Reveal 12 mini-games hidden among the I SPY riddles. • Play 3 logic puzzles to unlock new rooms of the castle. • Collect inventory objects to advance gameplay.
